name: @symphoniacloud/dynamodb-entity-store
description: A lightly opinionated DynamoDB library for TypeScript & JavaScript applications

scripts.local-checks: tsc && npm run lint && npm run unit-tests
scripts.all-checks: npm run local-checks && npm run integration-tests
scripts.deploy: cd test/examples && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file template.yaml --stack-name "${STACK_NAME-entity-store-test-stack}" --no-fail-on-empty-changeset
scripts.deploy-and-all-checks: npm run deploy && npm run all-checks
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc -p tsconfig-build-esm.json && tsc -p tsconfig-build-cjs.json && echo '{"type": "module"}' > dist/esm/package.json && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > dist/cjs/package.json
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run local-checks && npm run build
